short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide and blur sensitive information on any webpage. Blur your secrets such as personal emails, public IP addresses, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically blur elements containing specific keywords on any webpage. This allows you to hide secrets from online meetings or anyone viewing your screen.

OpenBlur is an open-source project under active development. Contributions and feedback are welcome.

GitHub repo: https://github.com/getvictor/openblur

For support, please create issues at https://github.com/getvictor/openblur/issues

Note: After installing, please test blurring on a different website since Chrome Web Store blocks extensions from interacting with its pages.
